notes.body_html:
Hello Avneet,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your order #653449286628761600-75009, I see your concern was highlighted for the missing item. I apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.

We have received an update from our Escalations team. As per the update, all the medicines were packed and dispatched properly. I am sorry, we will be unable to comply with your refund request. Please be informed that the update was shared with you after a thorough check.

I highly appreciate your understanding in this regard.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Devdas.

notes.body: Hello Ashay Mishra,         Greetings from PharmEasy!  We are trying to connect you at your contact number (8867807129) but the calls were left unattended from your end. Hence requesting you to kindly revert us with your convenient time or alternate number to assist you further.     Further, we would like to inform you that the Plus Membership 50% cashback is divided into two parts:  20% cashback (up to Rs. 200) 30% cashback, which requires applying a specific coupon  In your order, you applied a discount coupon (950GET) instead of the 30% cashback coupon. Hence, for this order, you received Rs. 200/- cashback.   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!  Regards, Reshma Kokare PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Ashay Mishra,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

We are trying to connect you at your contact number (8867807129) but the calls were left unattended from your end.
Hence requesting you to kindly revert us with your convenient time or alternate number to assist you further.

Further, we would like to inform you that the Plus Membership 50% cashback is divided into two parts:

20% cashback (up to Rs. 200)
30% cashback, which requires applying a specific coupon

In your order, you applied a discount coupon (950GET) instead of the 30% cashback coupon. Hence, for this order, you received Rs. 200/- cashback.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
Reshma Kokare
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
https://aventis-learning.com/course/super-secretaries-and-power-administrators-elevating-your-administrative-edge/


** ⭐ Transform Your Administrative Role with Confidence & AI
------------------------------------------------------------

Behind every high-performing organisation is a team of exceptional secretaries and administrators who bring structure, strategy and stability to the workplace. This empowering workshop helps administrative professionals elevate their performance by combining personal mastery with modern digital capability. In the first half of the programme, participants strengthen self-awareness, interpersonal effectiveness and resilience through reflective activities, communication practice and EQ-based techniques to enhance confidence and presence.

The second half focuses on hands-on practice with cutting-edge AI tools for scheduling, note-taking, project coordination and document management, enabling learners to streamline workflows and amplify productivity. By integrating mindset with skillset, this course transforms administrators into agile, tech-savvy and indispensable drivers of organisational success.

Note: Learners are required to bring an internet-enabled laptop for the course.

Please contact Ms Calista at 6720 3333┃Whatsapp: 8040 9568 │ Email: training.aventis@gmail.com for a complimentary quotation & consultation


** Course Details
------------------------------------------------------------

HRP Code: AV0662

Course Title: Super Secretaries’ And Power Administrators: Elevating Your Administrative Edge

Fees: SGD 680.00 (excluding GST)
✨ Bonus
* Eligible NTUC members can claim up to 50% off total course fees via UTAP Funding after course completion!
* Register 3 or more participants together to enjoy an exclusive group discount

------------------------------------------------------------
Jan

07

Wed


** Classroom
------------------------------------------------------------


**
------------------------------------------------------------


**
------------------------------------------------------------
Time: 9.00 am to 5.00 pm

Venue: Classroom session at Holiday Inn Atrium (Halal)/ Holiday Inn Orchard City Centre/ Concorde Hotel

Register For This Session (https://aventis-learning.com/course/super-secretaries-and-power-administrators-elevating-your-administrative-edge/?getregistration=a00OQ000001JbMhYAK&cohort=a01OQ00000EjxgfYAB&c=110743)


** Learning Outcomes
------------------------------------------------------------

Upon completion of the course, learners will be able to:
* Identify their communication preferences and understand their impact on workplace interactions.
* Apply emotional intelligence strategies to build trust and supportive alliances.
* Strengthen resilience using structured problem-solving and self-empowerment techniques.
* Explore and experiment with AI-powered tools to optimize administrative efficiency.
* Integrate personal strengths with digital solutions to raise their professional effectiveness.


** Course Outline
------------------------------------------------------------

Module 1: Unlocking Self-Awareness
* Hands-on activity: Discovering your communication preferences
* Reflection: Celebrating victories and identifying roadblocks as a PA or AE
* Open forum: Sharing workplace concerns and exploring performance drivers

Module 2: Navigating Interpersonal Dynamics
* Understanding and applying Emotional Intelligence (EQ)
* Building emotional capital to strengthen workplace alliances
* Using powerful phrases to elicit positive responses and avoid common pitfalls
* Adapting and fine-tuning communication styles for greater influence

Module 3: Building Robust Resilience
* Developing emotional fortitude in challenging environments
* Applying a 3-step problem-solving structure for workplace hurdles
* Cultivating self-empowerment and maintaining an optimistic outlook

Module 4: Exploring AI-Powered Tools for Administrative Excellence

(Hands-on practice — laptops required)
* Smart Note-Taking & Minutes
* Scheduling & Task Management
* Communication & Writing Polish
* Document Handling & Workflow
* Collaboration & Visualization

Module 5: Action Planning & Integration
* Reflecting on key takeaways from both self-mastery and tech exploration
* Crafting a personal action plan: combining mindset shifts with tool adoption
* Sharing next steps to elevate performance as a strategic PA/administrator
* Remarks: Learners are required to bring an internet-enabled laptop for the course


** Trainer's Profile
------------------------------------------------------------

Personal Development and Wellness Coach - Diana Rahman

Diana Rahman is a seasoned corporate trainer, personal development coach, and image consultant with over 23 years of experience transforming professionals into high-performing individuals. As an ICF ACC-trained coach and former banking professional, Diana seamlessly blends her corporate expertise with her passion for soft skills development.

Diana has conducted training programs for diverse industries, focusing on Professional Image Presentation, Business Communication, Leadership Skills, Stress Management, and Customer Service Excellence. Her high-impact sessions include projects such as a 10-day bootcamp for La Digue Lodge in Seychelles, where she led team building and customer service training initiatives.

Awarded the Promising Star Trainer accolade in 2012, Diana is celebrated for her dynamic presentation style, which engages participants from financial, hospitality, healthcare, and creative industries. She is also a certified memory trainer under Alan Yip, equipping professionals with advanced study and memory techniques.

Beyond her training expertise, Diana is a co-founder of an IT company specializing in corporate branding and web development. Her entrepreneurial spirit shines through in her Amazon #1 bestseller book, Venus Rising: The Phoenix Awakens, which shares her journey of resilience and success. Diana’s unwavering commitment to empowering professionals makes her a highly sought-after coach and trainer.


** Hear From Our Learners!
------------------------------------------------------------

"Diana's friendly and professional demeanor created a positive learning environment. I gained valuable insights, particularly on the importance of empathy in communication."

- Lim Suan Suan, Personal Assistant, MSF (2024)

"The trainer's enthusiastic and experienced approach made the session enjoyable. The emphasis on empathy and the sharing of real-life experiences from participants were particularly insightful."

- Joanne Sim, Personal Assistant, Standard Chartered Bank (2024)

"The trainer's knowledge and ability to adapt the course to our specific needs were impressive. The training on giving and receiving feedback was particularly valuable."

- Victor, Assistant Manager, Singapore Sports School (2024)

"Diana listen to our needs and has catered the course so that we can learn efficiently and useful. The focus on emotional intelligence was particularly relevant and beneficial."

- Mei Jin, Admin Executive, St Joseph Institutional International Elementary School Ltd (2024)

============================================================

General Enquiries / Looking for Group Discounts?

Ms Calista │ WhatsApp: 8040 9568 │ Call: 6720 3333 │ Email: training.aventis@gmail.com

** WhatsApp (http://wa.me/6580409568)

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us. notes.body_html:
Hello Ashok Kumar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #653834253471518720-42150, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 01st December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I understand your concern regarding the mail.     I would like to inform you that we only export in pan-India. We regret the disappointment caused to you. Please note, in the future, if we expand our serviceability, you will be notified accordingly.     You may place a new order from the PharmEasy application or website- www.pharmeasy.in, or you may call us at  999 29 999 29 and Press 1 to place an order. If the medicine is available, it will be delivered to you. Please note that the orders can only be placed from an Indian-registered mobile number.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 8071324888.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,  Tahera
notes.body_html:
Hello,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I understand your concern regarding the mail.

I would like to inform you that we only export in pan-India. We regret the disappointment caused to you. Please note, in the future, if we expand our serviceability, you will be notified accordingly.

You may place a new order from the PharmEasy application or website- www.pharmeasy.in, or you may call us at  999 29 999 29 and Press 1 to place an order. If the medicine is available, it will be delivered to you. Please note that the orders can only be placed from an Indian-registered mobile number.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section. Alternatively, you can also call us on 8071324888.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Tahera

ZACA INTERNATION
================


International Auditing Firm
30 Years of Experience

All countries

**(Syria – Lebanon – Turkey )**

 


**To the Management of Charitable Organizations and NGO,**

**Greetings,**


We are pleased to introduce **ZACA International**, established in 1992 and specializing in providing a variety of financial solutions and services, including accounting, auditing, taxation, and statistics, alongside consulting services in other specialized areas. **ZACA International** operates according to the highest professional standards and is an accredited partner in the **UC&CS GLOBAL** network, which grants it a unique capability to offer comprehensive and locally tailored financial services that align with global standards.

Given the importance of financial transparency for institutions and charitable organizations, we invite you to consider **ZACA International** for inclusion in your list of approved service providers. You may contact us for a detailed quote based on your specific needs in the following areas:


- **Auditing** (Internal and External) 
- **Project Auditing** 
- **Accounting and Financial Reporting** 
- **Financial Consulting Services** 
- **Training** 
- **Statistics and Data Analysis** . 
With **ZACA International**, you will gain a partner committed to high quality and dedication in serving organizations that strive to achieve social impact. We take pride in our ability to assist in fostering the necessary transparency and financial accountability, enhancing the trust of donors and partners in the projects.


Why ZaCa?
---------


There are several aspects that distinguish **ZACA International** from other companies in the fields of accounting, auditing, and financial consulting, making it a reliable and effective partner for clients. Below are the main qualities that set us apart:

**1. Experience and Specialized Expertise**


- Since 1992, **ZACA International** has built a solid track record of experience serving international and local organizations, especially in auditing development and charitable projects. 
- Our focus on auditing projects involving international grants and non-profit initiatives gives us a deep understanding of the unique challenges and requirements in these fields. 
**2. Accreditations and International Networks**


- We are an independent member of the **UC&CS GLOBAL** network and an accredited partner of **UC&CS AMERICA**, giving our clients access to a global network of expertise and resources. 
- In addition to local and regional accreditations, we are committed to the highest international accounting standards, enhancing our credibility and making us a trusted partner for clients across various countries. 
**3. Multilingual and Highly Qualified Team**


- Our team speaks Arabic, English, Turkish, and French, facilitating tailored services for a wide range of clients and improving communication and understanding of their needs. 
- We continuously train our teams, relying on certified accountants and auditors capable of handling all types of projects. 
**4. Comprehensive and Diverse Services**


- We offer integrated services that include financial auditing, accounting, financial consulting, statistics, risk management, and training. This diversity enables us to provide comprehensive solutions for all client needs, helping them improve the efficiency of their financial operations and enhance transparency. 
- Additionally, we specialize in providing specialized auditing services that require the highest standards of security and credibility. 
**5. Commitment to Professionalism and Transparency**


- We are fully committed to transparency in every step of auditing and financial reporting, giving our clients confidence that our reports represent an accurate and truthful reflection of their financial performance. 
- Thanks to our adherence to clear methodologies based on international standards, our clients can easily meet the requirements of donors and regulatory authorities. 
**6. Flexibility and Responsiveness to Clients**


- We provide flexible services tailored to different client needs, which enhances our ability to deliver effective and responsive services. 
- Our relationship with clients is built on genuine partnership, as we work as one team to achieve the desired goals, offering continuous advice that aligns with the development of projects and client needs. 
**7. Specialization in Supporting Non-Profit Organizations and Development Projects**


- We have specific expertise in auditing projects funded by international or local entities, giving us insight into the complex reporting and funding requirements associated with these projects. 
- Our commitment to this field reflects our complete understanding of the role of these projects and the importance of achieving transparency and efficiency in their management. 
 

In summary, **ZACA International** is distinguished by its experience, reliability, and ability to provide comprehensive and specialized services, making it an ideal partner for organizations seeking financial services that meet the highest standards.

[ Call to action](https://7mkch.r.ag.d.sendibm3.com/mk/cl/f/sh/1t6Af4OiGsE8LIlZskp9oLwll5YGFo/SDZWH7FwgPo2)

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Pharmeasy Team,

Greetings from IIM Visakhapatnam!

We are pleased to invite Pharmeasy to explore a partnership with us for Sanshrey 2026, the annual alumni homecoming hosted by the Alumni Committee of IIM Visakhapatnam. Scheduled for 25th–26th January 2026, the two-day event will bring together alumni, students, faculty, and distinguished guests for cultural performances, curated networking opportunities, entertainment sessions, and interactive engagements.

Why Partner With Sanshrey 2026?
This platform offers a unique opportunity to engage with a high-value audience:

  *   1000+ attendees over two days, ensuring strong brand visibility.
  *   Access to a 3000+ global alumni network spanning diverse industries and leadership roles.
  *   Multiple touchpoints for sustained and meaningful audience interaction.

What We Offer
Based on your preferred sponsorship tier, Pharmeasy can benefit from the following opportunities:


1.     Brand Visibility

     *   Logo placement on event banners, posters, lanyards, and official collaterals.
     *   Branding on stage backdrops, installations, and visual communication panels.
     *   Social media visibility through event posts, tags, mentions, and campaign highlights.

2.     On-Ground Presence

     *   A dedicated booth space at the venue for engagement, demos, or interaction.
     *   Product placement, sampling, or giveaways to enhance brand recall.

3.     Audience Engagement

     *   Logo integration in the official post-event highlights video.
     *   Acknowledgment during opening and closing ceremonies.
     *   Tailored branding experiences aligned with your brand goals.

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Sponsorship Invitation – Sanshrey 2026 | IIM Visakhapatnam
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Pharmeasy Team,
 
Greetings from IIM Visakhapatnam!
 
We are pleased to invite Pharmeasy to explore a partnership with us for Sanshrey 2026, the annual alumni homecoming hosted by the Alumni Committee of IIM Visakhapatnam. Scheduled for 25th–26th January 2026, the two-day event will bring together alumni, students, faculty, and distinguished guests for cultural performances, curated networking opportunities, entertainment sessions, and interactive engagements.
 
Why Partner With Sanshrey 2026?
This platform offers a unique opportunity to engage with a high-value audience:
  • 1000+ attendees over two days, ensuring strong brand visibility.
  • Access to a 3000+ global alumni network spanning diverse industries and leadership roles.
  • Multiple touchpoints for sustained and meaningful audience interaction.
 
What We Offer
Based on your preferred sponsorship tier, Pharmeasy can benefit from the following opportunities:
 
1.     Brand Visibility
    • Logo placement on event banners, posters, lanyards, and official collaterals.
    • Branding on stage backdrops, installations, and visual communication panels.
    • Social media visibility through event posts, tags, mentions, and campaign highlights.
2.     On-Ground Presence
    • A dedicated booth space at the venue for engagement, demos, or interaction.
    • Product placement, sampling, or giveaways to enhance brand recall.
3.     Audience Engagement
    • Logo integration in the official post-event highlights video.
    • Acknowledgment during opening and closing ceremonies.
    • Tailored branding experiences aligned with your brand goals.
Please find the Sponsorship Proposal link here for your reference: Sanshrey 2026 Sponsorship Proposal .pdf
 
We would be glad to discuss how we can tailor the partnership to align with your marketing objectives and audience priorities.
 
Thank you for considering this opportunity. We look forward to the possibility of collaborating with Pharmeasy for an impactful and memorable Sanshrey 2026.
 
Thanks and Regards
Sai Charan Atluri
Junior Coordinator
Alumni Committee, IIM Visakhapatnam
Contact: +91 - 7710914364
